title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.758 - Joining plastic pipe by heat fusion; equipment maintenance and calibration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.758 - Joining plastic pipe by heat fusion; equipment maintenance and calibration

State Regulations

Each operator must maintain equipment used in joining
plastic pipe in accordance with the manufacturer"TMs recommended practices or
with written procedures that have been proven by test and experience to produce
acceptable joints. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.758

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
